actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 414 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 414 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S2311-2319; text: CR S2313) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate tax loopholes and special interest tax breaks for the PGA tour, the NFL, NASCAR, Hollywood, fish tackle box manufacturers, and Eskimo whaling captains.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 414 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate tax loopholes and special interest tax breaks for the PGA tour, the NFL, NASCAR, Hollywood, fish tackle box manufacturers, and Eskimo whaling captains.
